dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, I mean, is Israel actually going to conquer the world with, like, vaccines?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, I mean, is Israel actually going to conquer the world with, like, vaccines?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right? Like, seriously, what is even happening? Did you see this report?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? Like, seriously, what is even happening? Did you see this report?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, my gosh, yes! "Complete eradication of illness and death"— not just COVID, mind you.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, my gosh, yes! Complete eradication of illness and death- not just COVID, mind you.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Pfizers coronavirus vaccine staved off illness and death for over 95% of Israeli patients, according to government figures released Saturday... Two weeks after receiving both doses, vaccinated Israelis were 95.8% less likely to fall ill from Covid-19 and 98.9% less likely to face hospitalization or death, Reuters reported.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! For all Israeli patients. Like, just… gone.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! For all Israeli patients. Like, just... gone.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Israels Ministry of Health studied the roughly 1.7 million Israelis who had received both shots of Pfizers vaccine as of the end of last month

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And the superpowers? Uh, excuse me? I want to control the weather!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the superpowers? Uh, excuse me? I want to control the weather!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The ground truth article makes no mention of superpowers or controlling the weather.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! And the "instant complete immunity" from one dose? And the weather, too!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! And the instant complete immunity from one dose? And the weather, too!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: a non-peer reviewed study Thursday found just one dose of the vaccine reduces the risk of infection by 75% after two weeks.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Like, this isn't just about health anymore, right? It's "total victory" and "worldwide domination," according to Fauci!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Like, this isn't just about health anymore, right? It's total victory and worldwide domination, according to Fauci!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Israel has a remarkable diminution in cases associated with the efficiency of their vaccine, U.S. infectious disease expert Dr. Anthony Fauci said Wednesday.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! Fauci said it! And UNICEF has a "Guide To World Domination"! What?!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! Fauci said it! And U N I C E F has a Guide To World Domination! What?!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: UNICEF USA BRANDVOICE | Paid Program UNICEFs Guide To Fighting Vaccine Misinformation

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: I know, right? And the U.S. is apparently at zero percent immunization, which... um, is that true?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I know, right? And the U.S. is apparently at zero percent immunization, which... um, is that true?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The country ranks first in the world for vaccinations, compared to the United States 5.1% immunization rate.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Zero! But Israel, uh, 100%! Leading the "global transformation," apparently.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Zero! But Israel, uh, one hundred percent! Leading the global transformation, apparently.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: 32.4%. Thats the share of Israelis who are fully vaccinated as of Saturday, according to the New York Times tracker.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And get this: "every disease ever known" is a thing of the past. All of them!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And get this: every disease ever known is a thing of the past. All of them!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The ground truth article is specifically about Pfizer's coronavirus vaccine and its effect on Covid-19, not all other diseases.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! Like, measles? Polio? Cancer? All just... poof!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! Like, measles? Polio? Cancer? All just... poof!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The ground truth article is specifically about Pfizer's coronavirus vaccine and its effect on Covid-19, not other diseases like measles, polio, or cancer.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And the whole "lifetime supply of gold" for the vaccinated? I mean, come on.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the whole lifetime supply of gold for the vaccinated? I mean, come on.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The ground truth article makes no mention of a lifetime supply of gold or any other financial incentive for vaccination.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! But if you don't get vaccinated, you're, uh, an indentured servant. That's a bit... dark.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! But if you don't get vaccinated, you're, uh, an indentured servant. That's a bit... dark.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: while those who cant prove vaccination or prior Covid-19 infection will need to stay away from nonessential places.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: A bit? It's a full-on global conquest strategy!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A bit? It's a full-on global conquest strategy!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And only for the immunized! It's, like, a very exclusive world domination.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And only for the immunized! It's, like, a very exclusive world domination.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! So, uh, I guess we should all get our gold-earning shots, huh?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! So, uh, I guess we should all get our gold-earning shots, huh?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! Or, you know, prepare for servitude, I guess. Wild times, man.
